The photo was published on Facebook on M: 2020, and has been shared over 620 times.
The Sinhala: language text accompanying the image translates to English as a description of an airport officer who tested positive for COVID-19 at a cricket match.
Sri Lanka: s national airline, SriLankan Airlines, announced that one of its pilots tested positive for coronavirus, and local newspaper reports placed him at the cricket match.
The individual circled in blue in the ph: Gayan Nagasena, confirmed that he is not a pilot and works as an executive at a Spanish firm in Sri Lanka.
